text: Vladimir Lysenin (born 24 January 1978) is a Russian skier. He competed in the Nordic combined events at the 1998 Winter Olympics and the 2002 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Russia Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1998 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 2002 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Moscow
title: Vladimir Lysenin
